query: Cognitive Wars: The AI Industrialization of Influence
prompt: Eye-level view of a single matte-black AI inference node—a compact cylindrical server with visible fiber conduits—sitting on a steel lab bench in a modern research lab, side-lit from the left and framed to the right with 25% clear space at the top for a header.
